text: Hi, my name is Michael Coyne.

I am the Vice President of

and today we are gonna be talking
about transforming medical
education with Level X
and a partnership with Amazon Web Services
and our telco partner Verizon.

So at Level X, we are a
medical video game studio,

and the video behind me is
showcasing some of the procedures
that we are creating.
And if you think about what we're doing,
we are democratizing access

to this very important
healthcare information.

Any learner anywhere in the
world on any device can get
access to a various amount of procedures,

whether it's cardiology or
gastroenterology or robotics.

It's a virtual sandbox
of different environments

that we have created, and
it's all powered by AWS.

So it's one thing to talk
about what we do conceptually.

It's a whole nother thing
to experience it firsthand.

It's all powered by AWS.
And while Carlos and I are standing next

So it's all about ease
of use and accessibility

and we appreciate it.
